description: ff. 107. 268 x 186; 172 x 96 mm. 21 lin. Shawwāl 1300. Anon. commentary on al-Wāridāt, same as Vat. 1383 and 1427 (both anon.); according to Baghdādī, Hadīyat al-ʻārifīn (1951-55), II, 227 the author is Muḥammad ibn Muṣṭafá al-Iskilībī (Iskilip: NE of Kastamonu), d. 922/1516 or 17. Ḥājjī Khalīfah, Kashf al-ẓunūn, col. 1995 mentions him as commentator of the Wāridāt, but does not give the title of his commentary. The ms. Topkapı Sarayı Müzesi Kütüphanesi Arapc̦a yazmalar kataloğu, 8884/1 (same title and incipit) is attributed to Nūr al-Dīn Zādah. Incip.: ... الحمد لله الذى الهمنا بتحقىق حقائق الاىمان The mss. Vat. and Topkapı Sarayı Müzesi Kütüphanesi Arapc̦a yazmalar kataloğu, read ḥaqqaqanā instead of alhamanā. The first comment runs as follows: ... قوله ... اعلم ان امور الآخرة لىست کما زعم الجهال اقول امراد من الجهال الذى ترکب جهله من جهتىن
alternative: Ḥaqīqat al-ḥaqāʼiq fī sharḥ kashf asrār al-daqāʼiq
title: Ḥaqīqat al-ḥaqāʼiq fī kashf asrār al-daqāʼiq.
subject: Bedreddin, Şeyh, 1358?-1420—Wāridāt.
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
